channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 23:45 Driven the alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 23:45 Driven the alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on further messages.#Sumy_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 21:42 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 21:42 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
